flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, Mrs. Watson grades 120 x 60% = <<120*60*0.01=72>>72 final exams.
At the end of Monday, she has 120 - 72 = <<120-72=44>>44 exams left to grade.
On Tuesday, she grades 44 x 75% = <<44*75*0.01=33>>33 final exams.
On Wednesday, she has 44 - 33 = <<44-33=11>>11 exams left to grade.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 44. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
